thread.section_title: 2 EMS Workers Struck, Critically Injured In The Bronx – CBS New York
thread.title: 2 EMS Workers Struck, Critically Injured In The Bronx
thread.title_full: 2 EMS Workers Struck, Critically Injured In The Bronx

author: Adam Harrington
title: 2 EMS Workers Struck, Critically Injured In The Bronx
text:
NEW YORK (CBSNewYork) — One person was in police custody late Thursday after two Emergency Medical Services workers were struck by a vehicle in the Bronx.
Around 7:10 p.m., the EMS workers were hit by a vehicle at White Plains Road and Watson Avenue in the Soundview section of the Bronx, officials told CBS2.
Both EMS workers were taken to Jacobi Medical Center and were reported in extremely critical condition.
Further details were not immediately available.
Stay with CBS New York for updates on this developing story.
